div.div: The University of Texas Permian Basin

p.span: The UT Permian Basin STEM Academy is an innovative, public, open-enrollment charter school currently located on the UTPB campus in Odessa. We are dedicated to implementing the newest, most promising practices in teaching science, technology, engineering and mathematics (STEM).
We believe that learning should be both engaging and social. Students work collaboratively on a challenging curriculum—enabling them to develop conceptual knowledge through project-based learning.
At the UTPB STEM Academy, students learn 21st-century skills like communication, research, collaboration, and problem-solving.
